Mark Webber feels people are being prematurely “harsh” on Lewis Hamilton, after the seven-time World Champion’s tough start to the season.

articles.title: Bruno Lage: Wolves must fight to the end - Express & Star
articles.description: Bruno Lage is not giving up on a late charge for a European spot as a demands a reaction from his Wolves side.
articles.content:
The 3-0 home loss to Brighton was a new low as Wolves' put in a disastrous performance to make it three consecutive losses and seven in the last 10 Premier League games.
